content: **cute pumpkin duck knitting pattern for halloween - free & easy pattern for beginners** meet my little pumpkin duck this is a fun and easy knitting project perfect for beginners and halloween season the pattern is free so grab your yarn and let s knit together i hope you enjoy knitting it as much as i did **techniques used ** all pieces are knitted flat and then sewn together you should already know how to cast on knit purl and cast off increase kfb and decrease ssk k2tog p2tog sew using mattress stitch and whip stitch **materials** - a pair of 2mm knitting needles straight or circular - susan s family alpaca and susan shetland yarns - toy stuffing less than 100g - sewing needle + scissors + sewing pins **finished size** the finished toy is approximately 15cm tall ------------ ***** see more my free knitting patterns see tips and tricks tutorial videos how to knit the patterns how to embroider the details how to make the accessories and more on https //cheryx com/ ***** if you decide to make this pattern or any of my patterns please share your photos of finished toys with me on your ravelry project or tag me on instagram using the hashtag #cheryx knitadream i can t wait to see your creations
